long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419:
Unlock Keyboard & Mouse. Use to unblock right mouse click, search, copy & more. 
Works with all websites! üëå

Features ‚≠êÔ∏è
 ‚úì Unblocking Clipboard (Cut, Copy, Paste)
 ‚úì Unblocking mouse functions (Right Click, Selection, Drag & Drop, etc.)
 ‚úì Unblocking CTRL + F , CTRL+Z, or any shortcut / hotkey 
 ‚úì Create unique / custom settings for each site 

-  A wonderful new kind of Enabler, that the world is missing to bypass bad UI UX design.
Keep Key Control.  (= Unblock HID hijacking =Prevent Human Interface Device overwriting )

Open Source! üéà  Check out HID Control Prevention's source code and contribute here:
   ‚Ä¢  https://github.com/victor-savinov/unlock-keyboard-and-mouse

Permissions explained:
  "Read and change all your data on the websites you visit": to be able to connect to and modify HID control of any website that does blocking/freezing.
